definition: lunar New Year's Eve
to get rid of/to remove/to exclude/to eliminate/to wipe out/to divide/except/not including
dusk/evening/Taiwan pr. [xi4]
the day before New Year's Eve

sentences.english: In SCB, dancing in the new year eve celerbration also.
sentences.chinese: 深圳渣打银行新年除夕晚会，舞蹈表演。

sentences.english: Reportedly, the Chinese people in a New Year's Eve see the old habits.
sentences.chinese: 据称，中国民间在除夕有守岁的习惯。

sentences.english: New Year's Eve is the time for family reunion.
sentences.chinese: 除夕之夜，迟一顿丰富年夜饭，是家人团聚的时候。

sentences.english: This year's New Year's eve, I was spent in shaoxing grandma's.
sentences.chinese: 今年的除夕，我是在绍兴奶奶家度过的。

sentences.english: New Year's Eve, an old man came into the village.
sentences.chinese: 一年除夕，一位老人来到村里乞讨食物。

sentences.english: The measure is advancing toward a final vote late Thursday, Christmas Eve.
sentences.chinese: 这项议案将于圣诞节的除夕夜星期四表决。

sentences.english: The movie was dumped on New Year's Eve.
sentences.chinese: 这部影片未经预映便于除夕夜直接放映了。

sentences.english: On one lunar New Year's Eve, an old man came into the village.
sentences.chinese: 一年除夕，一位老人来到村里乞讨食物。

sentences.english: On New Year's Eve, many people stay up the whole night.
sentences.chinese: 在除夕之夜，很多人都是整晚不睡来守岁的。

sentences.english: Chinese New Year Eve chanting, praying for longevity, Lion dance, tea party.
sentences.chinese: 农历年除夕延生法会，舞狮，茶叙。

sentences.english: I had a blast on New Year's Eve with my cousins.
sentences.chinese: 除夕夜那晚我和我的表兄妹们玩得很开心。

sentences.english: Then they huddle around the kitchen hearth waiting for the first dawn of the bright New Year.
sentences.chinese: 他们在除夕也要大扫除，然后一家人围在炉边守岁。

sentences.english: On New Year's eve, at 8 o 'clock came, also began in the Spring Festival gala.
sentences.chinese: 除夕之夜，8点来了，春节联欢晚会也开始了。

sentences.english: On the Eve of Chinese New Year, supper is a feast with families. The family will end the night with firecrackers.
sentences.chinese: 除夕夜，家人会一起吃年夜饭，过年时会放鞭炮。

sentences.english: Hogmanay is derived from the winter solstice festival celebrated by the Vikings.
sentences.chinese: 除夕夜是来自冬至节由维京庆祝。

sentences.english: She recited a long poem at the New Year's Eve entertainment.
sentences.chinese: 她在除夕晚会上朗诵了一首长诗。
